title: Review Available Metrics and Confirm Reports - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: In the Reports section, you can use the classic reporting or the advanced analytics reporting to prepare dashboards and reports based on metrics that you want to track. Learn about classic reporting and Advanced Analytics . You can utilize the Netskope Library in both classic reporting and Advanced Analytics to select the required templates made-up of widgets that will perform pre-defined reporting functions. Shown below is a preview of report results. Blocking online ads: Traffic from high-risk countries:
